name: Ice-js-projects
tagline: Demo of several projects that I made using the ICE GamingJS Editor.
body:
### Spinning Donut
An Animation of a Spinning Donut. I played around with different materials, lightning and shadows. The shadow of the donut changes according to position of the donut. 
<https://github.com/>
 
### Fruit Hunt
A cute little game. Move your character around and grab the fruit from the shaking trees using your spacebar. 
<https://github.com/>

### Planets
A View of the Sun, the Earth and Mars. Press A for Solar System View. Press E for View of Mars from Earth. Learnt about the Particle Generator System which was used to create the stars. 
<https://github.com/>

### Moon Phases
Check out the different phases of the moon! Press C or spacebar to switch views. Press P to pause the simulation. Use 1,2,3 to control the speed of the animation. 
<https://github.com/>


More Stuff coming soon!


These Projects are based on the book "3D Programming for Kids" by Chris Strom. Don't let the "for Kids" label fool you; the concepts introduced in this book are very powerful and are a great help for anyone who wants to learnt how to code from scratch. 


Project by Sim Yi Xuan

Student and Aspiring Engineer


[using GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://guides.github.com/features/mastering-markdown/).
